SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractLight
Base class for lights in the raytracer, holding the emitted color/intensity.
AbstractVec3
Immutable base for 3D value types (Vector, Point, Color).
Camera
Pinhole camera model with lookFrom, lookAt, up vector, and vertical field of view in degrees.
Color
RGB color stored as doubles in [0,1].
DirectionalLight
Directional light with a fixed direction (infinitely distant source).
FloatEquals
Numeric utilities for tolerant floating-point comparisons and hashing.
Intersection
Intersection record holding distance t, position, surface normal, and hit shape.
Main
Entry point for the raytracer executable.
Orthonormal
Builds an orthonormal camera basis (u, v, w) from camera parameters.
Plane
Infinite plane defined by a point and a (possibly non-unit) normal vector.
Point
3D point (position).
PointLight
Point light emitting from a specific origin in space.
Ray
Ray defined by an origin point and a (typically normalized) direction vector.
RayTracer
Core ray tracing engine responsible for generating camera rays and shading pixels.
Renderer
Renders a Scene via a RayTracer into a BufferedImage and saves it to disk.
Scene
Scene container holding camera, output settings, ambient light, lights, and shapes.
SceneFileParser
Parser for the custom scene description format.
SceneParseException
Unchecked exception thrown when a scene description cannot be parsed.
Shape
Base class for renderable shapes.
Sphere
Sphere defined by a center point and radius.
Triangle
Triangle defined by three vertices a, b, c.
Vector
Immutable 3D vector supporting common operations used by the raytracer: add, subtract, scale, component-wise multiplication, dot, cross, length and normalization.
